name: shsspwh

body.origin:
|- wss(csh, cpw(chba))
-| wss(csh, cpw(cuni(csh)))
-| wceq(cpw(chba), cpw(cuni(csh)))
body.pretty:
⊢ SH ⊆ P(~H)
⊣ SH ⊆ P(⋃ SH)
⊣ P(~H)= P(⋃ SH)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(csh, cpw(chba))
-| wss(csh, cpw(cuni(csh)))
-| wceq(cpw(chba), cpw(cuni(csh)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ SH ⊆ P(~H)
⊣ SH ⊆ P(⋃ SH)
⊣ P(~H)= P(⋃ SH)

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(chba, cuni(csh)), wcel(chba, csh), wral(hs0, csh, wss(cv(hs0), chba)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(chba, cuni(csh))
-| wcel(chba, csh)
-| wral(hs0, csh, wss(cv(hs0), chba))
-| wi(wa(wcel(chba, csh), wral(hs0, csh, wss(cv(hs0), chba))), wceq(chba, cuni(csh)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ~H = ⋃ SH
⊣ ~H ∈ SH
⊣ ∀(hs0 ∈ SH, hs0 ⊆ ~H)
⊣ ((~H ∈ SH ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ SH, hs0 ⊆ ~H))→ ~H = ⋃ SH)

body.origin:
|- wral(hs0, csh, wss(cv(hs0), chba))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csh), wss(cv(hs0), chba))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(csh, cpw(chba))
-| wi(wa(wcel(chba, csh), wral(hs0, csh, wss(cv(hs0), chba))), wceq(chba, cuni(csh)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csh), wss(cv(hs0), chba))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ SH ⊆ P(~H)
⊣ ((~H ∈ SH ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ SH, hs0 ⊆ ~H))→ ~H = ⋃ SH)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(csh, cpw(chba))
-| wi(wa(wcel(chba, csh), wral(hs0, csh, wss(cv(hs0), chba))), wceq(chba, cuni(csh)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(chba, csh), wral(hs0, csh, wss(cv(hs0), chba))), wceq(chba, cuni(csh)))
-| diffsc(hs0, chba)
-| diffsc(hs0, csh)
body.pretty:
⊢ ((~H ∈ SH ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ SH, hs0 ⊆ ~H))→ ~H = ⋃ SH)
⊣ d(hs0, ~H)
⊣ d(hs0, SH)
